What one fool can do, another can. 
 Ancient Simian Proverb

A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. 
 Chinese Proverb

Even monkeys fall from trees. 
 Japanese Proverb

The wise learn many things from their enemies. 
 Ancient Greek Proverb

Fall seven times, stand up eight. 
 Japanese Proverb

He who asks is a fool for five minutes, but he who does not ask remains a fool forever. 
 Chinese Proverb

A wise man makes his own decisions; an ignorant man follows public opinion. 
 Chinese Proverb

The nail that sticks out gets hammered down. 
 Japanese Proverb

Do not judge by appearances; a rich heart may be under a poor coat. 
 Scottish Proverb

No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible. 
 Voltaire

A cat has nine lives, but needs only one. 
 English Proverb

The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now. 
 Chinese Proverb

When the character of a man is not clear to you, look at his friends. 
 Japanese Proverb

One who smiles rather than rages is always the stronger. 
 Japanese Wisdom

A man who chases two rabbits catches neither. 
 Chinese Proverb

If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together. 
 African Proverb

The frog in the well knows nothing of the great ocean. 
 Japanese Proverb

A gem is not polished without rubbing, nor a man perfected without trials. 
 Chinese Proverb

Better to light a candle than to curse the darkness. 
 Chinese Proverb

When the wind of change blows, some build walls while others build windmills. 
 Chinese Proverb

Three men make a tiger. 
 Chinese Proverb

To know the road ahead, ask those coming back. 
 Chinese Proverb

An invisible thread connects those who are destined to meet. 
 Chinese Proverb

The tongue like a sharp knife... Kills without drawing blood. 
 Buddha

A wise man adapts himself to circumstances, as water shapes itself to the vessel that contains it. 
 Chinese Proverb

One beam, no matter how big, cannot support an entire house on its own. 
 Chinese Proverb

Even if you are on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there. 
 Will Rogers

If you want happiness for an hour, take a nap. 
 If you want happiness for a lifetime, help somebody. 
 Chinese Proverb

Just as tall trees are known by their shadows, 
 so are good men known by their enemies. 
 Chinese Proverb

A wise man can learn more from a foolish question 
 than a fool can learn from a wise answer. 
 Bruce Lee

Be water, my friend. Empty your mind, be formless, shapeless — like water. 
 You put water into a cup, it becomes the cup. 
 You put water into a bottle, it becomes the bottle. 
  You put it in a teapot, it becomes the teapot. 
  Now, water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend. 
 Bruce Lee

Water is the softest thing, 
 yet it can penetrate mountains and earth. 
 This shows clearly the principle 
 of softness overcoming hardness. 
 Bruce Lee
